404.description: You hear music in the distance, but nothing can be seen here.

description: Listen Together with Friends around the Globe. All you need are your favorite songs and a YouTube, Spotify, or Apple Music account.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p: Be sure to reach out at any time should you have any ideas, questions, or encounter any bugs.

delete.label: Deactivate account
delete.description: You can delete your account at any time.

modal.title: Sad to See You Go...
modal.description: Deactivating your account will remove all of your information, stories.

delete.success: Your account and data has been removed. Feel free to come back at any time!

profile.title: About Myself
profile.authPrompt: Join Stereo to customize your profile.

username.label: Username
username.helpText: {{maxLength}} characters max, lowercase, no space or special characters

listening.title: Listening on {{name}}
listening.connectedTo: Your Stereo account is connected to {{name}}. If you wish to switch

listen.title: Listen
listen.description: Discover new songs that others are listening to and join them in real time
listen.promptJoin: Tune in to what {{username}} is listening to
listen.promptJoinNolive: Tune in to what {{username}} listened to

fromSearch.title: Select from a link
fromSearch.helpText: Enter a playlist link to listen together
fromSearch.noResults: No songs found from the link below. Try a different one!

fromPlaylist.title: Select from your playlists
fromPlaylist.authPrompt: Join Stereo to connect to your playlists

addNew.title: Create New Story
addNew.promptText: How would you describe the story
addNew.promptPrivacy: Are you listening in public or private

story.label: Story
story.description: Join {{title}} on Stereo and listen to music together.

queue.title: Tracks
queue.notAllowed: You are not allowed to add songs to this story

chat.title: Chat
chat.authPromptHook: Listen to music with friends and chat no matter where they are with a Stereo account

delete.title: Delete story
delete.confirmPrompt: Are you sure you want to delete this story?

end.title: End story
end.explain: You will not be able to add any new songs to this story but will be able to replay played songs at any time later.

ongoing.prompt: You have an ongoing live story. You must end it before continuing.

share.title: Invite friends
share.authPrompt: Join Stereo and easily invite people you follow

feed.title: Story feed
feed.instruction: Tap to play next songs. Swipe up to discover more stories.

user.description: Join {{username}} on Stereo and listen along to the music with friends around the globe.

player.title: Player
player.noneHelpText: Add a song to listen together
player.noCrossTrack: This song is not available on {{platformName}}

youtube.footerText: YouTube Premium lets you enjoy ad-free and background play. See

spotify.premiumRequired: A Spotify Premium subscription is required
spotify.notSupported: This browser may not be supported
spotify.footerText: A Spotify subscription is required to play any track, ad-free. Go to

player.signInSuggest: Sign in to use your own music application

result.confirmAdded: This song has already been added. Add again?

search.title: Search
search.helpText: To search, enter some keywords, a song link, or a playlist link

manager.empty: It's lonely around here... Let's add a song!

playlist.authPrompt: Join Stereo to Add Songs to Playlists

new.title: New Playlist
new.youtubeNotice: You may need to have a YouTube channel or sign up for YouTube Music to create a playlist

auth.hookDefault: Start listening to music in sync with friends in public or private stories. All you need is an YouTube, Spotify, or Apple Music account.
auth.label: Sign in to Stereo

footerText.pre: By continuing, you agree to our friendly

auth.permissionLink: Why asking for such permissions from my account?
auth.createNotice: If you did not previously sign up, you will be creating a Stereo account

common.dangerousActionText: This process is immediate and cannot be undone

error.sorry: We are sorry for the inconvenience
